description: [SUNBURST](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0559) used the WMI query Select * From Win32_SystemDriver to retrieve a driver listing.(Citation: FireEye SUNBURST Backdoor December 2020)

external_references.description: FireEye. (2020, December 13). Highly Evasive Attacker Leverages SolarWinds Supply Chain to Compromise Multiple Global Victims With SUNBURST Backdoor. Retrieved January 4, 2021.
